2. InstallationÂ¶

Soon, installers will be available for all major platforms. Right now, Formality-Core can only be installed through npm. Install npm following this guide. Then, go to the command-line and simply type:

npm i -g formality-core

This should install it. In order to test if it worked, type:

fmc

If you see our command-line instructions, Formality-Core has been successfully installed in your system. If you have any problem during this process, please open an issue.
